title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the CosmicWebMapper project, including data sources, algorithms, visualization techniques, and user interface needs.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture for the CosmicWebMapper, including data ingestion pipelines, data storage solutions, algorithm implementations, distributed computing strategies, and visualization components. Consider scalability, performance, fault tolerance, maintainability, security, and compliance with relevant standards and regulations. Include details on how to handle large datasets, potential bottlenecks, and strategies for real-time updates. Also, provide a high-level diagram of the proposed architecture.

title: Develop Data Processing Pipeline
description: Implement the data processing pipeline to ingest and preprocess astronomical data from various sources.

title: Implement Cosmic Web Mapping Algorithms
description: Develop and implement algorithms for mapping the cosmic web of dark matter and galaxies based on the processed data.

title: Design and Develop Visualization Components
description: Design and implement interactive visualization components to display the mapped cosmic web data in an intuitive and informative manner.

title: Set up Development and Testing Environment
description: Configure the development and testing environment, including version control, continuous integration, and deployment pipelines.

title: Develop Test Suite
description: Create a comprehensive test suite to ensure the correctness and reliability of the CosmicWebMapper system.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to protect the system and data, including authentication, authorization, and data encryption.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the CosmicWebMapper system, including user guides, developer guides, and API documentation.
